page.title: 09GHOSTS AND LEGENDS
page.content: {In}Windsor Forest there is a ghost. Some say it is the anciend forest god, some say it's Herne the Hunter, keeper of Windsor Forest. Herne has a body of a man with antlers on his head. {Legend}says that in winter at still of midnight, he walks around a great oak tree, with great ragged horns. He blasts the tree, takes the cattle, makes the milking cows give blood and shakes the tree in a hideous and dreadful manner. {One}night about twenty years ago, sone boys found a horn at the edge of Windsor Forest. They blew it, and at once a horn answered from deep in the wood. Then came the baying of hounds, and Herne the hunter appeared, riding on a black horse his ragged horns dark against the sky.Terrified,the boys dropped the horn and ran.
